about_the_game:
Fight for your lives as a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) against hordes of evil woodland creatures. Survive as long as you can while building the ultimate ninja (who also happens to be a cat) before being overwhelmed... or perhaps overcoming incredible odds to survive one more day.

Nine Lives Ninja: Survive Demo is a casual action roguelite game with multiple abilities, upgrades, and cat customization. It is lovingly crafted with hand-drawn characters, enemies, and environments.

Features

  • Weapons automatically fire at nearby enemies - allowing you to focus on survival
  • Three active abilities: dodge, create traps, and create shadow clones who fight for you
  • Cat customization! Multiple cats with different starting loadouts can be unlocked
  • Invest in upgrades between runs to help you survive longer and become even deadlier

This Demo Includes

  • One level from the game
  • Limited upgrades and unlocks to try out
  • Demo is in English only (full game will be localized)
  • Note: Nine Lives Ninja: Survive is currently in development and this Demo version may be updated based on player feedback

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: In Nine Lives Ninja: Survive Demo you are a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) forced to fight for your lives against hordes of evil woodland creatures. It includes one level from the game and limited upgrades to try out.
